name: Synthetic Nutrient Base
//: (Dehydrated Meat 400 + Dehydrated Veggies 400 + Dehydrated Fruit 320 / 4 for portions) * 1.1 for cooking gains
description: A powder derived from dehydrated meats, vegtables, and fruits. Has been perciscely cooked to increase effective vitamin content and lost much flavour due to the process.
